title: Chasing Sam
description: Librarian Note: New cover/title edition for ASIN# B00EC2CSEI.  Fourteen-year-old Kenny Davis has dreamed of being with Sam Jewel since forever, but he's too shy to talk to her. When he wishes on a magic stone and gets a twin, he comes up with the perfect plan to catch Sam's attention: to double date with her and her twin sister, Jess.But having Twin Benny doesn't make things easier. He hits it off with Jess right away while Kenny stumbles over his words when he's near Sam. But Benny  is  him. Sort of. If he's got the confidence, Kenny must have it, too. Can he overcome his shyness or will he be forever stuck chasing a dream?
author: Dee J. Stone
